introductions.label: Full Stack
introductions.text: Senior Full Stack Developer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Expert in TypeScript, React, and Node.js with a strong focus on clean architecture, performance optimization, and mentoring engineering teams. Proven track record of delivering high-impact products in fast-paced environments.

introductions.label: Frontend Lead
introductions.text: Frontend engineering lead with deep expertise in React ecosystem, design systems, and micro-frontend architectures. Passionate about developer experience, testing strategies, and bridging the gap between design and engineering.

bullets: Architected and led the migration from monolithic React app to micro-frontend architecture, reducing build times by 60%.
Designed and implemented a real-time collaboration system serving 50k+ concurrent users using WebSocket and Redis pub/sub.
Established company-wide design system (Storybook + Tailwind) adopted by 4 product teams, reducing UI inconsistencies by 80%.
Mentored a team of 5 developers through code reviews, pair programming, and weekly tech talks.
Implemented comprehensive E2E testing strategy with Playwright, achieving 95% coverage on critical paths.
Led the adoption of TypeScript across all frontend repositories, reducing production bugs by 40%.
Built a real-time analytics dashboard processing 1M+ data points per day with interactive D3.js visualizations.
Migrated legacy jQuery application to Next.js, improving page load times by 70% and SEO scores by 45 points.
Developed a custom GraphQL API layer aggregating data from 6 microservices into a unified schema.
Implemented server-side rendering and incremental static regeneration, reducing server costs by 35%.
Introduced automated visual regression testing, catching 15+ UI bugs per sprint before production.
Developed a SaaS platform for project management from scratch, reaching 10k users in the first year.
Built RESTful APIs with Express and PostgreSQL, handling 500+ requests per second.
Implemented OAuth2 authentication flow and role-based access control system.
Set up CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions and Docker, reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes.
Created an interactive Kanban board with drag-and-drop, real-time sync, and offline support.
Delivered 20+ responsive websites for SMB clients using React and modern CSS.
Built reusable component library that reduced project delivery time by 30%.
Collaborated directly with designers to implement pixel-perfect UIs from Figma mockups.
Optimized website performance, achieving 90+ Lighthouse scores across all client projects.

details: Specialization in Software Engineering and Distributed Systems
Thesis: Real-time data synchronization in distributed web applications
Focus on algorithms, databases, and web development
